lines.text: The very first thing you must learn in becoming a princess is how to hold your head.
I intend to "hold it" on top of my neck.
Where is my royal assistant, Goofinoff? Is Goofinoff "goofin' off" again?
Old Syrupy Strings over there, she's always dragging the tempo!
To play music is to live. To live is to suffer. To play music, then, is to suffer.
To know you is suffering enough, pizzacato breath!

[sticks her bow at Alexei / Accordion like a sword]
Can it, WindBox!
Well, Goofinoff? Is she up there?

[playing with the Checka's crow]
Here pretty little raven birdy, come to Daddums, you sweet little black birdy of death!
[crow knocks Goofinoff's toupee into the mud.]

[talking about Anastasia]
The last heir to the Romanov throne!
